charges.charge_description: 18 USC 7 &; 13: Count 1 ORC 4511.19(a)(1) DUI; Count 2 ORC 4511.25 Left of Center; Count 1 6mos/$1000/SA: $10/90days-3 yrs revocation Count 2 $100/SA: $5

charges.charge_disposition: Prob 1 yr w/conditions; serve 3 day term of incarceration on weekend as appointed by BOP; attend min 2 AA mtgs a week w/verification; complete substance abuse treatment; pay fine within 6 mos from date placed on term of prob sup; Fine $200; SA: $10 (-1)
